comment._content: The middle man is the late Mwalimu Julius Kambarage Nyerere- former President of the Republic of Tanzania. Born 1922 ,son of Chief Burito of the Zanaki tribe. His Mother was Mugaya. Nyerere died  14/10/2000. He is best known for promoting a philiosophy of land and community called Ujamaa. He fought for independence from British rule -called Uhuru. He also promoted pan-Africanism and was a well known author of several political books - Essays on socialism, Freedom and Development/Uhuru Na Maendeleo and Man and Development.  He also was at the forefront of fighting for freedom in Southern Africa and Tanzania was one of the so called 'Frontline states' in this endeavour..
